description: A delicious, refreshing, crunchy Salad to enjoy during the Summer months.
name: Apple Feta Salad Leaves with Toasted Walnuts Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 cup mixed leaves (spinach, cos lettuce, kale)
1 medium granny smith apple, peeled, cored, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Into a medium bowl add lemon juice, sliced apple and enough water to cover the apples, mix well, set aside. This will prevent the apples browning. Into a small dry non stick frypan, toast the walnuts. Stay with them as they can burn quickly. Set aside to cool.
To make dressing: Into a small screw top jar with a lid, combine oil, apple cider vinegar, maple syrup, wholegrain mustard and salt & pepper to taste. Seal jar and shake vigorously until combined.

To assemble salad: Into a medium serving salad bowl, add the mixed leaves, drained apple slices, toss to combine. Scatter crumbled feta and walnuts over the top. Lastly pour over the dressing and enjoy!
